featured.text: After hours of discussion, our class finally reached the _____ that we would go to Hualien for our graduation trip.

definition.zh_def: 花蓮是台灣東部的一個城市，以其美麗的自然景觀和文化著稱。
definition.en_def: Hualien is a city in eastern Taiwan known for its beautiful natural scenery and cultural significance.
definition.example: I visited Hualien last summer and was amazed by its stunning landscapes.
